content: this legal text provides an overview of a case numbered 6002023 without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case involves a party who is owed a sum of euro 938700 the text explains that the case lasted for 11 years and involves the claiming of certain assets and rights these assets are represented by 10 shares which have been assigned to a specific lot as required by the law if the parties cannot reach an agreement lots will be drawn to determine the outcome of the case the courtappointed expert will identify the lots for each party the case is a civil action regarding the dissolution of a hereditary community and the division of property the plaintiff requests the court to declare the legitimate succession and dissolve the hereditary community while the defendants oppose the dissolution and argue for the division of jointly owned assets the court approves the division project and allocation of shares and orders the completion of the division the court also addresses the costs of the proceedings which will be borne by the estate and the parties involved the court has made a final decision in the case declaring that the estate will be divided according to a division plan prepared by an expert appointed by the court the court orders the allocation of specific lots to the parties involved based on their requests and specified conditions the costs of the proceedings and the experts report will be paid by the estate the court offsets the costs of the litigation between the parties
